name: NewYorker
text: The deal that lawyers for Purdue Pharma have been quietly negotiating with Donald Trump's Justice Department could be a reprise of the way the company evaded accountability for its role in the opioid crisis 13 years ago. https://t.co/KCgWuNUlX5

name: NewYorker
text: Michael Cohen’s memoir becomes truly engaging in its quotidian details, which reveal the sleazy, petty, combative ambience of the Trump Organization, and, later, of the Trump Administration. https://t.co/FRCYqrKiIf

name: NewYorker
text: “People are not really worrying about this, because it is inconvenient to act responsibly,” one aerospace engineer said, of the growing accumulation of high-speed space pollution orbiting the Earth. https://t.co/XBYg8PlEYK
